questions.question: Every time I attempt to check my statistics, I am getting an error, how do I fix this?
questions.answer: Ensure your privacy settings allow the public to view your game details, give the Steam API up to 1-2 hours to detect this update.

questions.question: Do you have any bots that supports any other games?
questions.answer: Currently as of 8/29/2020 we do not, but we plan on creating a bot for Minecraft next.

questions.question: Does this bot happen to be open source?
questions.answer: I will be making this bot open source when I get the chance to, since it pretty much could serve as a template for any other Steam game.
